skills.name: KINDLE
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to grant Counterstrike on up to 2 allies.
• Damage dealt increases based on the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: BRAND
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Transform the beneficial effects on enemies into Physical Burns.
• Damage dealt increases based on the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: EXTINGUISH
desc: Grants Immunity to Burn and Freeze effects, including unblockable Freeze effects, for all allies.
